participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and supportive, loves to encourage others and enjoys sharing her experiences.
participant_1.background: I caught a huge fish on my last fishing trip! I like to sing. I am 17. I have two adopted kids. I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and organized, finds joy in making others happy and values family moments.
participant_2.background: I love to see my son's face light up when he sees his new toys in his nursery. I always sleep 8 hours a day. I have never had alcohol. My hair is colored purple. I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Good morning! I'm getting ready for my wedding in the park.
Oh my gosh, congratulations! That's so exciting!
I'm sure it will be a beautiful day.
I hope so! I'm trying to not stress out about it too much.
That's good, you don't want to get too stressed out.
Yeah, I know. I'm just trying to enjoy the moment.
That's the best way to do it!
I know! I'm so glad I decided to have a small wedding.
Yeah, that sounds like a great idea.
It is! I'm only inviting my closest family and friends.
Yeah, I think it will be a lot more intimate that way.
Well, I'm sure it will be a beautiful day and I wish you all the best!
